snippet: The artist Tom Sachs is going on a mission to Mars, but it will only go as far up as Manhattan’s Upper East Side, where he will examine the compulsion to explore outer space.
abstract: Artist Tom Sachs examines the human compulsion to explore outer space in his installation at the Park Avenue Armory in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The artist Tom Sachs is going on a mission to Mars, but it will only go as far up as Manhattan’s Upper East Side, where he will examine the compulsion to explore outer space.

headline.seo: Tom Sachs Prepares for Liftoff at Park Avenue Armory
headline.main: From Earth to Mars, at the Armory
headline.print_headline: From Earth To Mars, At the Armory
